caption: This live recording features an instrumental song. This Regional Mexican song features an accordion playing the main melody. This is accompanied by an acoustic guitar strumming chords. A double bass plays the bass notes. A tambourine acts as the percussion. This song is in an upbeat mood. The song can be played at the entrance of a carnival.
